summary: This document is a telephone call detail record from AT&T, produced on June 17, 2020, in response to a query for records from March 1, 2020, to June 15, 2020. It lists hundreds of individual call records for a specific phone number (2996479), showing connection times, durations, and technical call features, indicating law enforcement monitoring of communications. This document is a detailed AT&T telephone record log, likely obtained via a legal request or warrant, covering call data from March 1, 2020, to June 15, 2020. It shows numerous call connections, durations, and technical features, indicating surveillance or investigation of a specific phone line. It was produced on June 17, 2020, and includes timestamps, call durations, data transfer volumes, and device information (Apple iPhone). It appears to be a law enforcement or legal request for subscriber records. keyFacts: The document is a detailed call log for phone number 2996479, covering March 1, 2020, to June 15, 2020.
The records were produced by AT&T on June 17, 2020, indicating a legal or law enforcement request for subscriber information.
The log shows frequent calling activity, including both mobile-originated (MO) and mobile-terminated (MT) calls, some with very long durations (e.g., over 60 minutes).
Technical call features are logged (e.g., CFNA for Call Forward No Answer), suggesting detailed network-level monitoring.
No personal names are revealed in this chunk; the data is purely technical call metadata for a specific subscriber number.
The document is a proprietary AT&T mobility record log for a specific line (potentially related to an investigation).
The records cover a period from March 1, 2020, to June 15, 2020, and were queried on June 17, 2020.
The log contains hundreds of detailed call entries showing connection dates, times, durations, and technical call features.
No specific individuals, locations, or case-related events are named in this technical data excerpt.
The document's significance lies in its nature as a detailed communication record likely obtained for investigative purposes.
AT&T produced detailed telecommunications records for account number 2996479 on June 17, 2020.
The records cover a specific time frame from March 1, 2020, to June 15, 2020, indicating a targeted request for information from that period.
The data shows extensive voice and data usage from a device identified as an Apple iPhone, with detailed timestamps and data transfer volumes.
The document is marked as proprietary and for use by authorized persons only, suggesting it was produced for law enforcement or legal proceedings.
The records are stored in UTC time but were queried using Eastern Time Zone, requiring conversion for analysis.
A detailed AT&T mobility data usage report for account MOBILITY 2996479 was produced on June 17, 2020.
The report covers data usage from March 1, 2020, to June 15, 2020, and contains hundreds of individual connection records.
